DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, observational, non-randomized study of interrater reliability of pupillary assessments, comparing two clinical assessments to the Pupillometer.
DOC.brief_title: Interrater Reliability of Subjective Pupillary Assessments
DOC.criteria: Patients are eligible for this study if they have been diagnosed with some form of brain trauma (e.g., stroke, traumatic brain injury, aneurysm) Prisoners Under 18 years of age
